parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake assist system can cause the vehicle to lose braking power, leading to increased stopping distances and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The brake assist warning light illuminates
the message "Brake Assist Failure - Drive with Caution" is displayed
the vehicle abruptly stops without driver input
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the malfunction indicator lamp (MIL) comes on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature tire wear and failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, especially when tires fail at high speeds.
symptoms: Tires worn down to unsafe levels (4/32in or less) at low mileage (under 27
no pressure sensor alarms until the blowout occurs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of adequate warranty and support from the manufacturer and dealerships can leave vehicle owners with unsafe tires and no recourse, potentially leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Dealerships refusing to work with Michelin to correct the issue
GM refusing to honor the service bulletin
and the warranty not applying to OEM tires provided on new vehicle purchases.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of airbag system components can leave vehicles inoperable, putting drivers and passengers at risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Delays in repairing vehicles due to unavailability of airbag system components
lack of loaner vehicles or acceptable rental car arrangements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Poor customer service and support can lead to frustration, financial burden, and prolonged periods of vehicle inoperability, affecting drivers' daily lives and livelihoods.
symptoms: Unhelpful or unresponsive customer service representatives
lack of transparency or communication regarding repair timelines and part availability.
